mapper.select: select c.contentsid, n.nationname, o.ottname, g.gradename, cl.classname, c.contentstitle, c.contentssummary, c.contentsstart, c.contentsseason, c.contentsepisode, c.contentsscore, c.contentsduration, c.imgname from contents_t c, ott o, nation_t n, grade_t g, class_t cl where c.ottid = o.ottid and n.nationcode=c.nationcode and g.gradeid=c.gradeid and cl.classid=c.classid order by c.CONTENTSSCORE DESC

select c.contentsid, n.nationname, o.ottname, g.gradename, cl.classname, c.contentstitle, c.contentssummary, c.contentsstart, c.contentsseason, c.contentsepisode, c.contentsscore, c.contentsduration, c.imgname from contents_t c, ott o, nation_t n, grade_t g, class_t cl where c.NATIONCODE='KR'and c.ottid = o.ottid and n.nationcode=c.nationcode and g.gradeid=c.gradeid and cl.classid=c.classid order by c.contentsid

select c.contentsid, n.nationname, o.ottname, g.gradename, cl.classname, c.contentstitle, c.contentssummary, c.contentsstart, c.contentsseason, c.contentsepisode, c.contentsscore, c.contentsduration, c.imgname from contents_t c, ott o, nation_t n, grade_t g, class_t cl where c.ottid = o.ottid and n.nationcode=c.nationcode and g.gradeid=c.gradeid and cl.classid=c.classid ORDER BY CONTENTSSTART DESC

select c.contentsid, n.nationname, o.ottname, g.gradename, cl.classname, c.contentstitle, c.contentssummary, c.contentsstart, c.contentsseason, c.contentsepisode, c.contentsscore, c.contentsduration, c.imgname from contents_t c, ott o, nation_t n, grade_t g, class_t cl where c.ottid = o.ottid and n.nationcode=c.nationcode and g.gradeid=c.gradeid and cl.classid=c.classid and CONTENTSID = #{CONTENTSID} order by c.contentsid
